name: Sour Strawberry Diesel
description: Sour Strawberry Diesel by MTG Seeds is a hybrid cross between Sour Strawberry and Turbo Diesel. With a sweet and spicy aroma, Sour Strawberry Diesel delivers a warm, uplifting buzz that melts away stress and bad moods. Its flowers grow into chunky buds with red and purple hues following its 8 to 9 week flowering cycle.
attributes_title: Happy, Relaxed, Euphoric, Uplifted, Talkative, Stress, Pain, Lack of Appetite, Depression, Insomnia, Dizzy, Dry Mouth, Dry Eyes, Anxious, Paranoid
